Text:
flac is a lossless codec for wav- files.
To decode you can use flac frontend.

Flat Lossless Audio Codec
Plays with Monkey Audio Player and FLAC addon for WinAmp ++

With Free Lossless Audio Codec (FLAC) it is possible to make musicfiles without losing quality.
Also playable with a free download of the "VLC" media player.
